comments.author: jrediger@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
Currently FOG looks at the upload pref (`datareporting.healthreport.uploadEnabled`) only at initialization.

It needs to watch it for changes and toggle upload accordingly.
comments.text:
Currently FOG looks at the upload pref (`datareporting.healthreport.uploadEnabled`) only at initialization.

It needs to watch it for changes and toggle upload accordingly.
comments.creator: jrediger@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text:
Now if the data upload pref is changed within a session, Glean will be
informed. This also comes with support for the "deletion-request" ping.
comments.author: chutten@mozilla.com
comments.creator: chutten@mozilla.com
